data.name: Defiance: Arktech Revolution
data.detailed_description:
Get the Defiance Arktech Revolution DLC pack and plunge into new advanced and expert events and co-op maps. Hunt deadly new enemies with legendary weapons and mods from Chimera, a rising force in the underground arms trade. Only the best-equipped will survive!

Key Features:
  • New Faction: The Chimera is a secretive criminal organization specializing in the trade and sale of arktech.
    New Weapons: Get legendary arktech weapons from the Chimera faction vendor.
    Nano Perks: New EGO perks add mechanics and power to elemental nano-effects.
    Free Chimera Arktech Kit: The Chimera grants all of its ark hunters a special gift!

For more information visit http://www.Defiance.com

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI Radeon HD 2900, or Intel HD 4000 integrated graphics or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 4750 or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
